user.title: Connect to Helen Energy
user.description: Enter your Helen Energy credentials to monitor your electricity consumption and costs

data_description.default_unit_price: Set a unit price if you want to override the price from Helen
data_description.default_base_price: Set a base price if you want to override the price from Helen
data_description.delivery_site_id: If you have multiple delivery sites, enter the ID of the site you want to monitor
data_description.include_transfer_costs: Check, if you want to track the transfer costs
data_description.is_fixed_price: Check, if you want to force a fixed price contract type. For example, if you have a contract that is not yet supported

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate with Helen Energy
reauth_confirm.description: Please enter your password again to reauthenticate with Helen Energy

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Helen Energy. Please check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, the service might be temporarily unavailable.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
